name: ca-certificate-import-action
description: GitHub Action for installing custom SSL/TLS certificates

scripts.release: standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags origin HEAD
scripts.release:patch: standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags origin HEAD
scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags origin HEAD
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags origin HEAD
scripts.release:pre-alpha: standard-version --prerelease alpha && git push --follow-tags origin HEAD
scripts.release:pre-beta: standard-version --prerelease beta && git push --follow-tags origin HEAD
scripts.release:pre-rc: standard-version --prerelease rc && git push --follow-tags origin HEAD
scripts.release:pre-dev: standard-version --prerelease patch --prereleaseId dev && git push --follow-tags origin HEAD
scripts.build: echo 'Build completed - action is ready for packaging'
